W18_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: Capitol City: Seat of the Union

W18_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: The city that awaited you on the other side of the door feels quite familiar. Could there be a cat here?

W18_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_DETAIL.text: There should be a cat around here.

W18_EVAR_AMYA_ABOUT_HERE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_AMYA_ABOUT_HERE_000_DETAIL.text: Discuss what happened in the elevator.

W18_EVAR_AMYA_ARTIST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_AMYA_ARTIST_000_DETAIL.text: Kate wants to go to the cafe in Grand Capitol Hotel.

W18_EVAR_AMYA_MEETING_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_AMYA_MEETING_010_DETAIL.text: This is the person who abducted Kate.

W18_EVAR_AMYA_MELANCHOLY_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_AMYA_MELANCHOLY_010_DETAIL.text: Kate has stopped in front of a building. Does she sense something amiss?

W18_EVAR_AMYA_CAUSE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W18_EVAR_AMYA_CAUSE_010_DETAIL.text: This is the woman who bumped into Kate. Why is she in such a rush?
